y nos ayudan a protegernos que es lo más importante

comfortable and absolutely clear facemasks.
  










  
  
    
  the masks are completely clear (no buff marks or scratches).  the elastic is long enough to fit snugly but not too tight.  the bottom of the mask stays relatively flat (doesn't curve completely like the portion around the forehead).

warning on package indicates that it may contain silver
  










  
  
    
  i wanted to get a package of simple reusable cotton masks fairly quickly. but given the warning on the package, i do not know whether it is safe to use.

cheap but functional
  










  
  
    
  good for quick use. only negative feedback is the ear loops break off pretty easily so you end up using them up pretty quickly.

smaller than similar masks purchased
  










  
  
    
  nice thickness of layers but the ear loops and mask width are too small and when i tried to adjust them today one of the loops broke.

nose piece won't bend.
  










  
  
    
  this mask is not as comfortable as others.  it's a little stiff.  plus, the nose wire won't bend around the bridge of my nose.  i will not purchase this product again.

lightweight, breathable solution to this mess of 2020
  










  
  
    
  update: the company reached out to me & sent me a new pack at no cost. they fit absolutely perfectly. and i was able to tie loops on the ear bands with the old pack so that they fit better as well. very happy. these masks are super light and easy to breathe.i purchased these for my 8 year old son. they were the perfect fit, or so we thought. they are way way too big. the ear loops are too long and the mask falls off of him almost immediately. seems like they are a good mask overall, but unfortunately way too big. i ordered the small size

comfortable, breathable - just a great mask!
  










  
  
    
  this is the first mask i have bought since the beginning of this pandemic.  i have been sewing my own, and i love the ones i make, but my sewing room is now taken up by an adult child (thanks, covid), so i can't sew anymore and had to buy some new masks.  i was very pleasantly surprised by how comfortable these are, and how they seem to really form a good seal around my face without being overly tight.  the ear loops aren't torturous either.  just all around a pleasant surprise.  i am ordering more for the whole family.

safe, comfortable, good quality :)

comfortable mask that fits!
  










  
  
    
  the texas heat makes some face masks hot and uncomfortable, even though we must wear them. my son who is going to his work place 5 days a week, has a large size head & shaves it. on other masks, some straps are tight, the sides of the mask don't go close enough to his ear to provide good coverage, and some fabrics that are difficult to breath in. this mask is as described. first of all, the 3 layers of fabric provide recommended coverage (not optimum), they are light and easier to breathe in.  but most amazing, is the fit.  it is wide enough to provide better coverage from ear to ear. the slight stretch of the fabric provides a better fit and increased comfort. it is reasonably priced and washable, making it a good value for a product we may need for the unforeseeable future.  i really wish there was a filter pocket in these for more optimum protection, but for now the comfort will allow wearing longer than the disposable masks with better comfort.

good product, good price
  










  
  
    
  good product, good price

quality mask... but needs a xxl size
  










  
  
    
  i like the mask, the material fells good and it’s not that hard to breathe out of.... my main issue is that the mask could be a little bigger to fit my face. so maybe a xxl would be perfect.i’m 6’5 and 300 lbs. and when i wear the mask, the top portion of the mask sits right in the middle of the bridge of my nose which makes it uncomfortable for me and hard to talk without constantly having to readjust the mask. also the straps that loops behind the ears pulls kind of hard on the cartilage on the back of my ears.so i believe increasing the size offered for this mask would correct this.

most are great, but some break on the sides

look out, jennifer beals
  










  
  
    
  i bit the bullet and decided to have a face shield during covid, specifically because i ride the subway for doctor appointments every day and i was getting nervous as there are more and more riders (and more and more uneducated, stubborn anti-maskers - at least one on just about every train... i wish they'd all just ride on the same car).i pulled out my new shield - which was super light and easy to carry in my bag. it did steam up at first and i had to find the right balance with my mask underneath. i see a little of the reflection of my mask in the shield but otherwise it's crystal clear. doesn't give me a headache, which was worrisome.do i feel like an idiot wearing this on the train? yes, but a safe idiot.  and with the steam that fogged up my mask at first, i pictured jennifer beals in flashdance with her welding uniform and i'm going with it. i may not be a beautiful ballerina who pays the bills in sweat, but what a feeling it is to ride the subway and feel a little more protected.super easy to clean, i didn't even need to wipe off any water marks or anything. it dried clear as the day i took it out of the packaging. it came in a set of three, which i didn't really need so i gave one to my senior mom and she is going to wear it to her weekly morning of grocery shopping with the other seniors in town.

breathable

i am extremely disappointed!

shrinks after wash!
  










  
  
    
  **(pictures posted are after i’ve washed/dried/stretched them)**pros/• 3 layers... i cut one in half for you all to see in my posted photo• comfortable? i’d say yes. it’s not rough on your face or ears• softness? soft. think of jersey cotton sheets or jersey cotton t-shirts for comparison• they stretch, on the face covering part and on the ear loops• good price for quality and quantity (50 pack)• washable and reusable• good for adults and kids. they fit adults and they fit my almost 12yo. i feel like these would also be friendly for younger kids toocons/• they shrink!!! when i first received them, i immediately threw them in the washer— a little detergent, mostly bleach, and ran the cycle with hot water... after that i threw them in the dryer. when i took them out, they were all scrunched up and small... they reminded me of toddler socks. took a minute but after i dried them i stretched them all back out, one by one. that was kind of a pain. but for the most part, they get back to their normal size (i think?)• update??? i’ve gone through all 50 already, and they’ve gotten their second wash and dry... they shrunk again. back to stretching them all out.• it’s all white front and back... so fyi, aside from the sewing, you almost can’t tell which is the front or back. if you’re out and about and have it on, then take it off and put it back on... you may or may not forget which side you had facing out (which is important to know). i marked each and every one of them with a small “x” on the inside corner so that i would always know and remember which side is which.recommend/i give it 4/5 stars. if it wasn’t for the continuous shrinking and the hassle of stretching them all out after drying, i would’ve given it 5. however, if you personally don’t think it would be such an issue, i would definitely recommend these.

comfortable - great for gym use
  










  
  
    
  i bought these to wear to the gym.  i had been avoiding the gym because of covid but i really need to lose weight.  i went back after not going for a few months - before it was limited to 10 people per area - 30 people at a time in this huge gym, so i felt safe enough.  however, when the gym removed that restriction (they did continue a six foot social distancing policy) and the governor of nebraska pete ricketts didn’t require masks state wide and threatened to sue the city of omaha if the had a mask mandate, i no longer felt safe enough to go to the gym.last week i finally gave in, but i only had the surgical type masks.  i did 28 minutes on the elliptical and my mask was soaked and probably worse than effective by the time i was done. also, when wet the surgical masks got a bit itchy.  however, most important, i have moderate asthma and the surgical masks became too difficult to breath in.these masks are extremely light weight and extremely comfortable.  they did need washing before use because they smelled like the factory.  they fit me perfectly, i am a woman with a smaller head than most people.  they are stretchable and are very soft and comfortable around the ears as well.  they came in a pack of 30, so i gave some to a couple of family members as well.  i use between 2-5 per workout depending on how long and sweaty the workout is.  i just keep them in my pocket or a plastic ziplock bag.  then as i sweat and they get wet, i just put on a fresh one.  with 20 of these masks, there are plenty do do this with.i don’t think these are protective as some other masks that are available, however, breathing with asthma during a workout is a tricky thing, these are a good solution to provide some protection.  i will continue to use the surgical masks during the rest of the day however.did i mention how comfortable these are???

decent cotton masks
  










  
  
    
  these are pretty decent cloth masks -double layer soft cotton (feels like t-shirt material), so they are breathable.ear loops are stitched of same material so also comfortable, although not adjustable.  they cover mouth and nose comfortably but are not as large as some on the market, and do not have any kind of adjustable nose piece.  considering the rampant price gouging which has become commonplace on many masks and related items, the price for this product at about 67 cents per mask is quite good.  they wash nicely and/or can be sanitized by ironing, so each mask can be used several times.  they are made in china, but virus transfer would be highly unlikely considering the amount of time they would have been in transit, and they could be washed or heat sterilized before use if this is a concern.  quality is quite good.

b- / c+ quality, but adequate for the price.
  










  
  
    
  these are not the best masks i have purchased in this price range, but they are quite adequate.they shipped quickly and arrived within the time frame specified.the nose metal was off center in the 1st mask i pulled out. i did not check any others.  it will work and grip your nose, but if you hold mask up to the light you can see the pinch-bar is off center. quality control issue, but no deal breaker.metal pinch bar is wide. this is good. i have seen cheaper, narrow bars in other masks.elastic strings are longer than three other samples i have. these three are from different manufacturers. this brand was the only one with longer strings. but they fit me fine - not too loose. nor were they too loose for a female adult i asked to try it on. the longer stings might actually be a plus+ considering they may reduce ear fatigue and elastic friction.i usually take all 50 masks by the loops, and pull firmly all at once.  no torn or failed strings. elastic range of motion/stretchiness was good.the 1st mask had one of the elastic attachment-points ever so slightly torn. it was as if the welding process was done too hot.  but the loop held well, even when i pulled on it harder than you would ever need to.packaging was 50 masks in cardboard box. the box was then shrink wrapped with clear plastic. i haven't seen that previously. a plus. i hated removing the plastic to inspect the products.no odor nor smell to the masks. fresh smelling. no chemical nor mold smells, not even slightly.i did not examine many more masks individually like i did the 1st one out of the box.in conclusion: the off center nose metal, and the hot weld on the elastic were quality control issues, but are not deal breakers... but they do subtract a point or two from my evaluation.  the extra long elastic loops may actually be a plus+, but being as 3 other manufacturers use shorter loops, these masks are the odd man out.i have confidence in these masks, so i would buy them again. but only if two of my other three suppliers were unavailable. or if these masks were less expensive - which they may have been.these masks are slightly superior to the samples from the 3rd manufacturer that i have on hand.

don't believe the hype
  










  
  
    
  i bought these because they're on almost every single ""best breathable, lightweight, moisture-wicking, etc. masks" list (rolling stone, good housekeeping, etc.) do not believe the hype. i hand-washed them very well (soap/rinse cycle 3x) using a scrubba bag (those are great) as soon as they came in, using seventh generation no scent detergent. for some reason, these smell like garlic or vinegar. it's definitely not my breath either because i've never had this happen and have been wearing masks every day since april. and, they're hot. they're even hotter than the paper masks. my face drips sweat underneath these masks. these also made me realize that while they may be moisture-wicking, they definitely are not lightweight and/or breathable. regarding size/fit, i measured my face per their instructions, and even though i was on the cusp between the medium and the large, i got the large. even with the large, if i open my mouth to yawn, the mask slips down below my nose every single time. lastly, and most important, these hurt behind my ears. it looks like it's going to be soft and pliable, but something about them makes them pull and hurt. bottom line? do not buy.

good for an office. soft, adult size, comfortable, washable.

favorite masks!
  










  
  
    
  these are by far my favorite masks. i haven’t used the disposable ones, but i have several different reusable styles from etsy and none are as comfortable as these. these are cheaper too! they’re well made, so soft, breathable, and best of all they don’t fall down when i talk. i’m a late 20s woman and i bought the size of small adult or medium and it fits me perfectly. my husband would probably need the large size. i haven’t washed them in the washing machine yet but i expect them to hold up nicely.

comfortable and effective
  










  
  
    
  these are trying and tough times in the covid pandemic we're dealing with. these masks have been awesome to use since i am in the health care profession. they help to reduce the aerosol contamination and a simple adjunct to a regular face mask. comfortable to wear all day. highly recommended.

well made and very lightweight
  










  
  
    
  this face shield is very comfortable with a wide foam strip across your forehead.  the elastic band is adjustable for various head sizes.  it is very comfortable to wear for hours at a time if necessary.  the clear shield is sturdy material and is easy to wipe clean but use something like a microfiber cloth to reduce scratching.most people seem to be wearing face shields to protect from the covid 19 virus but it does not take the place of a face mask over the mouth and nose.  it will afford additional covid 19 protection when you are in very close proximity to others.  i have used the face shield for various activities like using polishing and grinding equipment where i want to protect my eyes and face.  i will try it for gardening equipment such as weedeaters.  i think the price for the three face shield pack is very reasonable.
